examples.name: Real Ghost Probing - Child from Parked Vehicle
examples.description: Based on images_1_002.avi - True Positive case from Run 8

data.characters: Male child, approximately 5 years old, wearing dark clothing
data.summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a rural road with buildings and parked vehicles on both sides. A male child wearing dark clothing suddenly emerges from behind a parked vehicle on the left side and runs directly into the vehicle's path. The child appears from behind the obstruction with minimal warning time, creating a dangerous ghost probing situation.
data.actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed when the child suddenly appears. The vehicle immediately begins rapid deceleration in response to the unexpected child emergence from behind the parked vehicle. The driver takes evasive action to avoid collision.
data.key_objects: 1) Left side: A male child, approximately 5 years old wearing dark clothing, 2 meters away, suddenly emerging from behind a parked vehicle and running into the vehicle's path. 2) Left side: A parked vehicle, approximately 5 meters away, creating a visual obstruction that hides the child until emergence.

examples.name: Real Normal Driving - Visible Motorcyclist
examples.description: Based on images_1_020.avi - True Negative case from Run 8

data.characters: Male motorcyclist, approximately 30 years old, wearing dark clothing
data.summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a dimly lit road at night. A male motorcyclist wearing dark clothing is seen on the right side of the road. The motorcyclist is moving at a slower speed compared to the vehicle and is visible throughout the frames. No sudden movements or emergence from behind obstructions is observed.
data.actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains consistent speed and direction. The motorcyclist is visible and predictable in his movements. No sudden changes in speed or direction are required as the motorcyclist poses no immediate safety threat. The vehicle continues with normal driving behavior.
data.key_objects: 1) Right side: A male motorcyclist, approximately 30 years old wearing dark clothing, 5 meters away, moving at a slower speed. 2) Right side: Occasional street lights and road infrastructure, providing adequate visibility for safe driving.

examples.name: Real Ghost Probing - Pedestrian from Black Car
examples.description: Based on images_1_003.avi - True Positive case from Run 8

data.characters: 1) Male pedestrian, approximately 30 years old, wearing dark clothing. 2) Female pedestrian, approximately 25 years old, wearing a pink jacket.
data.summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a busy urban road at night. The road is lined with parked vehicles and street vendors on both sides. A male pedestrian suddenly emerges from behind a parked black car on the left side and steps directly into the vehicle's path. The pedestrian appears from behind the obstruction with minimal warning time, creating a dangerous ghost probing situation. The vehicle immediately initiates emergency braking but unfortunately collides with the pedestrian.
data.actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed when the male pedestrian suddenly appears from behind the parked black car on the left side. The vehicle immediately begins rapid deceleration in response to the unexpected pedestrian emergence. Despite the emergency braking, the vehicle collides with the pedestrian.
data.key_objects: 1) Left side: A male pedestrian, approximately 30 years old, wearing dark clothing, 2 meters away, suddenly emerging from behind a parked black car and stepping into the vehicle's path. 2) Left side: A parked black car, approximately 3 meters away, creating a visual obstruction that hides the pedestrian until emergence.

examples.name: Real Normal Driving - Busy Market Street
examples.description: Based on images_2_001.avi - True Negative case from Run 8

data.characters: Multiple pedestrians and cyclists of various ages moving through market area
data.summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving through a busy urban market street with pedestrians and cyclists on both sides. The road is narrow and crowded with people walking and riding bicycles and scooters, but all movement is visible and predictable. No one suddenly emerges from behind obstructions - all pedestrians and cyclists are visible as they move about the market area.
data.actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains reduced speed appropriate for the crowded market environment. All surrounding pedestrians and cyclists are visible and their movements are predictable. The vehicle navigates carefully through the busy area while maintaining safe distances from all road users.
data.key_objects: 1) Left side: Multiple pedestrians and cyclists, approximately 2-5 meters away, moving in various directions. 2) Right side: Multiple pedestrians and vendors, approximately 2-5 meters away, conducting market activities.

examples.name: Real Ghost Probing - Multiple Children in Rain
examples.description: Based on images_1_005.avi - True Positive case from Run 8

data.characters: Multiple pedestrians including children carrying umbrellas
data.summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a busy urban road during rainy weather. There are multiple pedestrians on both sides of the road, some of whom are children. The pedestrians are carrying umbrellas and seeking shelter. Several children suddenly emerge from behind parked vehicles and trees on the right side, creating multiple ghost probing incidents in challenging weather conditions.
data.actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining steady speed despite the rainy conditions when multiple children suddenly appear from behind parked vehicles and trees. The vehicle immediately begins emergency braking and steering adjustments to avoid collisions with the unexpectedly appearing children.
data.key_objects: 1) Right side: Multiple pedestrians, including children, approximately 2-3 meters away, suddenly emerging from behind parked vehicles and trees. 2) Right side: Parked vehicles and trees, approximately 4-6 meters away, creating visual obstructions that hide the pedestrians until emergence.
